original_text: So please listen to what I am asking you. Some people among you think that we live like people who belong to this world. When I come to visit you, I am sure that I will be brave enough to speak against those people. But I do not want to have to speak strongly like that against all of you. Corinthians 9 Corinthians 11
korean_text: 또한 우리를 육신에 따라 행하는 자로 여기는 자들에 대하여 내가 담대히 대하는 것 같이 너희와 함께 있을 때에 나로 하여금 이 담대한 태도로 대하지 않게 하기를 구하노라

sentences.original_text: So please listen to what I am asking you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 내가 너희에게 구하는 것을 들어주십시오

sentences.original_text: that we live like people who belong to this world
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 이 세상에 속한 사람들처럼 산다고

sentences.original_text: When I come to visit you
I am sure that I will be brave enough
But I do not want to have to speak strongly like that
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 그렇게 강하게 말하고 싶지 않습니다
